Starter_cards.name: Glittle
Starter_cards.abilityText: Glittle takes -1 Damage from Boss attacks

Starter_cards.name: Douber
Starter_cards.abilityText: Draw a Utility card before a battle, if it is a stat increase then attach to Douber

Starter_cards.name: Paulmer
Starter_cards.abilityText: Paulmer can heal a teammate once a battle for 3HP

Starter_cards.name: Spyke
Starter_cards.abilityText: Spyke takes -2 Damage on the 3rd turn of Battle

Starter_cards.name: Rapleer
Starter_cards.abilityText: Rapleer deals +2 Damage if attacked while blocking

Starter_cards.name: Stuic
Starter_cards.abilityText: If Stuic wins a battle, draw a Utility card

Starter_cards.name: Ssserpo
Starter_cards.abilityText: Ssserpo deals +2 Damage on the 3rd turn of Battle

Common_cards.name: Bladee
Common_cards.abilityText: Gain 5TP if you hold 3 Bladee

Common_cards.name: OffSpring
Common_cards.abilityText: If Offspring transforms, transforms another deject

Common_cards.name: Moxe
Common_cards.abilityText: Moxe can only double damage on turn 2

Common_cards.name: Trixard
Common_cards.abilityText: Trixards attack is doubled every time a new target is attacked

Common_cards.name: Bowly
Common_cards.abilityText: Bowly gains +3 attack if opponents attack is below 4

Common_cards.name: Sectoid
Common_cards.abilityText: Every attack Sectoid can heal opponent or itself for 3 hp

Common_cards.name: Magmuck
Common_cards.abilityText: Magmuck has a 1/6 chance to deal double damage every attack

Common_cards.name: Pointdex
Common_cards.abilityText: Reroll opponents movement dice once

Common_cards.name: Cheeps
Common_cards.abilityText: Cheeps can only increase defense on turn 2

Common_cards.name: Klep
Common_cards.abilityText: Gain 4p if Klep defeats a boss

Common_cards.name: Glup
Common_cards.abilityText: You may repick a wild deject once

Common_cards.name: Spung
Common_cards.abilityText: Prevent the effects of black spaces

Common_cards.name: Mistnose
Common_cards.abilityText: prevent all abilities in battle until Mistnose dies

Common_cards.name: Toofaze
Common_cards.abilityText: Toofaze gains +3 attack against wild dejects

Common_cards.name: Blaw
Common_cards.abilityText: gain access to trade center once

Common_cards.name: Zoglox
Common_cards.abilityText: Steal -2p from a player

Common_cards.name: Boomburst
Common_cards.abilityText: Reduce the attack of a minion by -2

Common_cards.name: Baclaphobe
Common_cards.abilityText: Baclaphobe doubles its attack every attack

Common_cards.name: Tortish
Common_cards.abilityText: steal a utility card from one player

Common_cards.name: Purrt
Common_cards.abilityText: draw a utility card

Common_cards.name: Vervolve
Common_cards.abilityText: transform with 3 TP instead of 5

Common_cards.name: Claknid
Common_cards.abilityText: choose to flip a coin, heads is double damage tails is attack miss

Common_cards.name: Lolywallup
Common_cards.abilityText: Deal +6 damage on turn 2

Common_cards.name: Snorkin
Common_cards.abilityText: miss attack to take half damage

Common_cards.name: Charcog
Common_cards.abilityText: Redraw a utility card

Common_cards.name: Salmyte
Common_cards.abilityText: double the effects of a utility card

Common_cards.name: Raidt
Common_cards.abilityText: Deal +1 damage to all opponenets every turn

Common_cards.name: Pluge
Common_cards.abilityText: Deal double damage to elemental dejects

Common_cards.name: Goob
Common_cards.abilityText: No ability
